app_detail:
Best doodle is a very easy to control free drawing app! It provide various drawing mode to free your imagination. With the magical kaleidoscope patterns, you will find that drawing wonder mandala flowersğŸŒ¼ is never as easy as this. If you are still worrying about your drawing skill, try auto draw mode. The AIğŸ¤– will help you perfect and finish your doodle!

No matter how old you are, toddler, little kid, teenage, adult or old people, you will find the game is a great fun way to get relaxed. ğŸ˜„Install now and enjoy the fun of doodling!

âœ¨ 16 different doodle patterns: you can draw wonderful things without any drawing skill; many kaleidoscope drawing modes included as well.

âœ¨ Auto draw mode: draw any shape as you like, the AI(artificial intelligence) will guess what you are drawing. With a simple tap, it will help you finish the drawing!

âœ¨Photo doodle: choose the provided phone for tracing doodle; or import photo from album and show off your creativity.

âœ¨My Gallery: review and share you master pieces.

âœ¨Color wheel: pick up any color as you want; also support random color for endless bright colors.

âœ¨ Magical paintbrushes: neon; rainbowğŸŒˆ; pearl, marker, silk and more.

âœ¨Playback: playback and save your drawing process as videos.

âœ¨ Share your painting via facebook, instagram, twitter, email, etc.
